title: Himi 340
lyrics:
M.L.
1.
Ko e mana lahi eni,
Pea ke tau tokanga’i,
Ko e fu’u foaki lahi,
Ki he kakai ‘o māmani.
2.
Ko e tamasi’i ‘Eiki
Ko e ‘Otua mo’oni;
‘Oku hā mai ‘i māmani,
Pea ‘Eiki, ki hēvani.
3.
Na’e fanau’i ‘i lalo ni
‘O tupu, ko e tangata,
Ko hotau hakeaki’i,
‘I he’etau angahia.
4.
Na’e fakahā ‘i mu’a,
‘E he ngaahi palōfita;
‘E ha’u, ‘a hotau Misaia,
Ko hotau langomekina.
5.
Tau ma’u ‘i he angavaivai,
‘A e Eiki, mei langi,
Pea fa’a fakafeta’i,
Ki hotau ‘Otua lelei. *
